Title: Relates to establishing a racial equity, social justice, and implicit bias training program for all state government and private employees in the state
Summary: Establishes a racial equity, social justice, and implicit bias training program for all state government and private employees in the state.
LawCode: Add ยง201-h, Lab L; add ยง153, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the civil service law, in relation to establishing a racial equity, social justice, and implicit bias training program for all state government and private employees in the state
